dct_title_s: Drainage Canals in Southeast Asian Peatlands
dct_description_sm: These images depict drainage canals and roads in peatlands in Borneo, Sumatra, and Peninsular Malaysia at 5 meter resolution. These canals were detected from July-September 2017 Planet Basemaps satellite imagery using a convolutional neural network. Please contact Nathan Dadap (ndadap@stanford.edu) with any questions.

Dadap, N. C., Hoyt, A. M., Cobb, A. R., Oner, D., Kozinski, M., Fua, P. V, et al. (2021). Drainage Canals in Southeast Asian Peatlands Increase Carbon Emissions, 1–14. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020AV000321

Doruk Oner and Mateusz Koziński and Leonardo Citraro and Nathan C. Dadap and Alexandra G. Konings and Pascal Fua. "Promoting Connectivity of Network-Like Structures by Enforcing Region Separation." arXiv (2020). Available at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.07011v1
